title: Tit for tat [Censored version]
creator_credit: Graeme Isaac, Mayfan and Film Australia
brief_description: Examines the world of tattoos and the surrounding culture of bikers and rebels as the filmmaker travels with Baldy, a biker and photo-journalist, to the Sandhurst Rally for the yearly Tattoo Exhibition and judging. There they meet AJ, the most tattooed man in Australia and a renowned tattoo artist himself. WARNING - SOME SCENES IN THIS PROGRAMME MAY OFFEND SOME VIEWERS.
